sessionList.title: Sessions

snackbar.importFailed: Failed to import session: Invalid file

confirm.deleteSession: Are you sure you want to delete session "{{name}}"?

sessionDetail.preferencesMinPeople: Add at least 2 people to set preferences

errors.preferencesRequired: Preferences are required for preference-based grouping
errors.groupSizeMin: Group size must be at least 1

warnings.groupSizeLargerThanPeople: Group size ({{groupSize}}) is larger than number of people ({{peopleCount}})
warnings.unevenDistributionOne: {{peopleCount}} people cannot be evenly divided into groups of {{groupSize}}. {{remainder}} person will be distributed across groups.
warnings.unevenDistributionMany: {{peopleCount}} people cannot be evenly divided into groups of {{groupSize}}. {{remainder}} people will be distributed across groups.
warnings.partialGroupOne: One group will have {{remainder}} person instead of {{groupSize}}
warnings.partialGroupMany: One group will have {{remainder}} people instead of {{groupSize}}
